column2: Unite the people of the Green Mountains into a mighty kingdom
Establish a mighty kingdom in the White Mountains
Establish a kingdom to reflect the wealth and power of our realm
Unite the Gardinian people under one flag
Having united all the Springfields accross America, I can now form the Empire of Springfield!
We have recovered all the lands of Massasoit's confederacy
Establish a new kingdom for our people
Unite the old state of Pennsylvania under one crown
